name: At The Wrong Place
description:
Story

You play as Dave.  

After you wanted to drive home at the evening, the engine of your car died. 

You've looked around, trying to find something to repair your car, but later, things have changed to a different plan. 

Controls
  • W, S : Move   
  • A, D or Mouse : Look around
  • Shift : Sprint
  • Space : Interact 
  • Space, E : Skip dialogue    
Featuring
  • A VHS effect.
  • PSX visuals.
  • Tank controls.

The game is about 15-20 minutes long

It's still a demo, so it isn't finished.

Developer Notes

You can also follow me on Twitter,  Youtube and Twitch!

If you enjoyed the game and want me to develop it further, let me know in the comments.
